meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a peso in several Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: I found ten centavos on the street.
meanings.sent2: In Mexico, you can buy candy with a few centavos.
meanings.sent3: The centavos in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were just a few centavos in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent5: The beggar was grateful for any centavos people gave him.
